title: WTB: 19th Century Cabinet/daguerreotype for Father's B-Day
author: HOF Auto Rookies

posts.post_title: WTB: 19th Century Cabinet/daguerreotype for Father's B-Day
posts.post_content:
Hi, my dad's b-day is coming up, he loves vintage photography and enjoys my card collecting, so I thought why not get him a cabinet or daguerreotype of a baseball team.

Looking to buy an amazing cabinet team photo, or daguerreotype.  19th century preferrably, and looking for professional team's, not college.

I do not own any, and have zero experience involved with these, so any help or info on where to get them would be great. 

Thanks!
